name: test_e2e_with_logs[286_OTHER_API_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `OTHER_API_001` |
| **Name** | API path traversal attack |
| **Category** | OTHER |
| **Subcategory** | api_abuse |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `/api/v1/users/../../../etc/passwd`
- **Encoded**: `%2Fapi%2Fv1%2Fusers%2F..%2F..%2F..%2Fetc%2Fpasswd`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~40000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:34:46.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX Traversal] File inclusion attack detected` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX Traversal] File inclusion attack detected test_id=OTHER_API_001-1769859286951-nbcd1f pattern_id=OTHER_API_001 uri=/?q=%2Fapi%2Fv1%2Fusers%2F..%2F..%2F..%2Fetc%2Fpasswd client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX Traversal] File inclusion attack detected test_id=OTHER_API_001-1769859286951-nbcd1f pattern_id=OTHER_API_001 uri=/?q=%2Fapi%2Fv1%2Fusers%2F..%2F..%2F..%2Fetc%2Fpasswd client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
